[[inst_sd_smin]]
==== SD.SMIN

*Syntax:* sd.smin<.{rl, f, rlf}> [SrcL], SrcR

*Description:* Atomic Signed Min operation: memory value is atomically signed mined with register.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_sd_smin.svg[SD.SMIN encoding,width=800]

*Group:* AMO/AMO
